title: Right on public transit, for easy commuting! Woodland Trace
posting_body: ['Location:', '1669 Iris Drive SE - Conyers, GA 30013', 'Rental Information:', '$1364/Month | 1', 'Bedroom 1 Bath | 720 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '12-Month', 'More Information:', 'show contact info', 'What you’ll find in our community!', '− Concierge', '− Courtesy Patrol', '− Emergency Maintenance', '− Parking', '− Pet Friendly', '− Short Term Lease', '− Smoke Free', '− Sports Courts', '− Storage Space', '− Tennis Court', '− 2 Community Playgrounds', '− 2 Sparkling Pools', '− 4 Common Picnic Areas with Barbeque Grills', '− Courtesy Patrol', '− Maintenance on site', '− Online Services', '− Package Service', '− Property Manager on Site', '− Public Transportation', '− Trash Pickup - Door to Door', 'Features in this apartment home!', '− Breakfast Bar', '− Cable Ready', '− Dining Room', '− Disposal', '− Microwave', '− Spacious Closets', '− Storage Units', '− Tub/Shower', '− Views', '− Window Coverings', '− Air Conditioning and Heating', '− Fireplaces in Select Units', '− Newly Renovated with Black Appliances', '− Patios or Balconies in Select Units', '− Refrigerator/Freezer', '− Renovated Apartment Homes Available', '− Sunroom in Select Units', '− Upgraded Flooring in Select Units', '− Washer/Dryer Hookup', '− Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', 'Call Woodland Trace at', 'show contact info', 'Experience apartment living done right at Woodland Trace, our thoughtfully designed and beautifully maintained community of apartments for rent in Conyers, GA.', 'At Woodland Trace, residents enjoy spacious floorplans brimming with natural light, modern gourmet kitchens, built-in breakfast bars, cozy fireplaces and private patios & balconies.', 'Plus, our gorgeous Conyers, Georgia apartments feature extra touches like full size washer and dryer connections, new appliances, faux hardwood flooring, modern brushed-nickel lighting, custom paint and tons of closet and storage space to make your life as comfortable and convenient as can be.', 'Enjoy the ultimate living experience at Woodland Trace Apartments in Conyers, GA.', 'The Sierra', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Pet Policy:', '$300 Pet Fee.', '$15 per month.', 'No aggressive breeds.', 'Management:', 'Ventron Management', '*Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'Prices are subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'AD19BA72B5D340A8']
